item.title: Star Wars: Episodes 10-12 Are Inevitable - It's Just A Matter Of Time
item.description: A brand-new Star Wars trilogy is in the works, and although it isn't yet clear whether this will be episodes 10-12, those episodes are inevitable.

item.title: 8 Fantasy Books With Unforgettable Villain Twists
item.description: Some fantasy books deliver surprising twists when it comes to their villains, and when handled correctly, these reveals leave a lasting impression.
